# <a name="add-emojis-or-gifs-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="41f49-102">Adauga emojis sau GIF-uri în Outlook pe web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="41f49-102">Add emojis or GIFs in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="41f49-103">Răspuns la un e-mail existent sau selectați **mesaj nou**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="41f49-103">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="41f49-104">Selectaţi smiley face</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="41f49-104">Select the smiley face</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="41f49-105">în partea de jos a ferestrei de scriere mesaj pentru a deschide panoul de expresiile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="41f49-105">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="41f49-106">Caută şi alege emoji sau GIF pe care doriţi să inseraţi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="41f49-106">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="41f49-107">Pentru mai multe informații, consultați [Particularizarea mesajului de e-mail în Outlook pe web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="41f49-107">For more information, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
